page.title: 05Property in Cranbrook
page.content: the south east is one of the most expensive areas for housing.There are four estate agents in Cranbrook.Prices range from 25,000 for a two bedroomed terraced cottage to a detached house with land for over 100,000.most houses in the Cranbrook area are in the 35,000-70,000 price range which means that first time buyers tend to look elsewhere for houses.Little new housing is being built.Recent developments have been on the Frythe estate.Any improvements in the town centre are carefully controlled by preservation orders.Rural properties are very expensive being priced over 70,000.Many are period houses although post second world war houses of character are available.Being in the Cranbrook school catchment area is an often used selling point by estate agents.
